entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json, multiple_queries #60741
  • Perf improvement: json, json_middleware, multiple_queries #60740
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, httpsys-encoded-url, json #60739
  • ASP.NET components relation to JSON settings #60738
  • [ Blazor] Joining multiple MarkupContent together with unclosed HTML elements #60737
  • POST /_blazor/negotiate returns 411 LengthRequired #60733
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #60732
  • Populate OTel Schema URL on Activity Sources and Meters #60729

Closed

  • Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #54978
    Backlog
  • Precompiled views fetching not working on .NET 8 for MVC views #60726
  • Kestrel inconsistent certificate chain handling between endpoint and default configuration #60709
    10.0-preview3
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #60722
  • [10.0-preview.1] ASP.NET OpenApi document references broken #60686
  • [10.0-preview.1] CS1591 warnings-as-errors caused by Program class being exposed as public #60683
  • Micro FrontEnds with Blazor Server (No Web Assembly) #60672
  • Blazor two-way bindings affecting incorrect binding object reference #60704
  • Multi-threading exception System.InvalidOperationException in the BlazorWebAppMovies sample (re: Blazor + QuickGrid + EF Core) #60721

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Selenium versions #60744
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable static code analysis pilot in pipeline #60743
    area-infrastructure
  • Check length of TypeArguments before accessing via index #60742
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2655284 #60736
    area-mvc
  • [Infrastructure] Avoid polluting the working set of files with changes after build #60734
    area-signalr
  • Add partitioned to cookie for SignalR browser testing #60728
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix use of ReconnectModal in Blazor templates with auto mode and global interactivity #60735
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix: Inconsistent certificate chain handling between endpoint and default configuration #60710
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview3
  • Suppress CS1591 warnings for PublicTopLevelProgram.Generated.g.cs #60727
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Support input validation for minimal APIs via generic resolver model #60724
    area-minimal
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • Fix OpenAPI server URLs for Aspire scenarios #60673
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0.x
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi to the webapiaot template (with an optional flag to disable it) #60337
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Setting the Description in a ProducesResponseTypeAttribute works correctly for Minimal API #60539
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Always call virtual UpdatePasswordHash #60252 #60592
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Don't send body in HEAD response when using PipeWriter.Advance before headers flushed #59725
    feature-kestrel, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-04
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Schedule "ignored directives" #9197

Updated

  • Extensions: use speakable implementation names #9195
  • Field nullability revisions #9184
  • Collection expression arguments: open questions #9158
  • Add proposal for ignored directives #9192
  • Field-backed properties: fix links #9193

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TableBuilder.ExcludeFromMigration is not Excluding transitive dependencies #35725
  • EF Core bundle upgrade seeding considerations #35723

Closed

  • SqlServer 9.0.2 Many To Many Relations - Delete Behavior Problem #35726
  • First-class span support causes translation failure with Contains #35100
    8.0.x
  • M.D.Sqlite: More robust cross-platform extension loading #35715
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Redact constants that get inlined from variables into query in log #35724

Merged

  • [release/9.0-staging] Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35717
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0-staging] Process Coalesce-simplified Convert node properly in funcletizer #35721
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35718
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transform Span-based overloads to Enumerable in funcletizer #35720
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/9.0-staging] Transform Span-based overloads to Enumerable in funcletizer #35719
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Label crashes on Windows due to infinite loop #28171
  • SIGSEGV on Android 5.1.1 #28170
  • [iOS] RefreshView Loading Indicator Stuck with CollectionView #28169
  • why it run well in debug mode, but not in release mode #28168
  • [Windows] MediaPicker.CaptureVideoAsync keeps handle to file after capturing video #28167
  • MAUI build fails with XARLP7024: System.IO.IOException: The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect #28166
  • FlexLayout misbehaves when Label content has long .Text #28165
  • RadioButton Focused and Unfocused Events Not Firing on iOS and Android #28163
  • [CollectionView]Crash occurs when switching CollectionView.IsVisible right after setting ItemsSource #28162
  • All sub-titles on the Table View Demo App page are inconsistent on iOS, Android, and Windows platforms #28158
    Backlog
  • The slider in the "Right to left TableView" page is abnormal in Android and iOS #28156
    Backlog
  • "Vibrate" Label in "Right to left TableView" on iOS platform is displayed from left to right #28155
  • All first-level headings in the Table View Demo App page are centered on the iOS platform. #28154
    Backlog
  • The border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows only #28153

Closed

  • Can't build Maccatalyst, getting error about merging CSS files? #21618
  • WinUI-Libraries are not compiled or found for packaging when publishing for Windows #28109
  • Label with Center or End horizontal alignment, and InputTransparency="true", sizes strangely #15633

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] add AOT profile for `dotnet new maui -sc` #28172
    platform/android 🤖, delighter, t/perf
  • [iOS & Android] Fix: RadioButton Focused and Unfocused Events Not Firing. #28164
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix RightToLeft is not working for Shell #28161
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Replace deprecated iOS OpenUrl #28160
    area-blazor, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fixed flickering when navigating using GoToAsync #28159
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Label LinebreakMode (TailTruncation) for FormattedText does't work in CollectionView after scroll - fix #28151
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, area-controls-label, collectionview-cv2

Merged

  • [ci] Publish VS workload zips #28145
  • [Testing] Enabling UITest Stepper actions for Maccatalyst #28055
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] [Shell] Ensure `AnimationFinished` is called when app backgrounds mid-animation #27534
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2792.45` to `1.0.2903.40` #24329
    area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Add test run message to device tests logs #27993
    area-testing, community ✨

Updated

  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR5
  • CollectionView2 Items display issue when Header/Footer is resized on iOS #27076
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Shell Navigation to a page without a Tabbar #27779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows/Android] Fix Dynamic ShellContent Title Updates at Runtime #27609
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Bindings SG] Filter out false positive Binding.Create matches #28138

  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

    community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: TapGestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion, partner/syncfusion/review
  • Fix Crashing issue with keyboard scrolling iOS #28148
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Trimming][PoC] Make it possible to trim controls and handlers #28115
    t/app-size
  • WebView2CompositionControl support for BlazorWebView #28063 #28104
    area-blazor, community ✨
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements #28119
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [iOS] Buttons with Gradient and ImageSource at the same time: ImageSource doesn't appear - fix #27572
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 9 SR5
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124

    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨

    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 15 #27965
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent duplicate Completed event when setting ReturnType in Entry #28018
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test issue #77424
  • Using ORPA with SDK 9.0.103 can choose an incorrect overload #77422
  • Update SCI and SRM references in syntax generator to 9.0 #77421
  • Could not load file or assembly System.Collections.Immutable #77414
  • Area - Add parameter check #77413
  • Extension method with constraint we're unable to check is silently skipped over #77407

Closed

  • IDE0028 changes program behavior without notice #77416
  • IDE0306 invalid code fix suggestion when using explicit interface implementation of Add #77425
  • "Add null check" quickfix should support generating ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull() calls #61181
    Backlog
  • Pattern Matching - DoesNotReturn attribute ignored leading to "Local variable 'value' might not be initialized before accessing" #77404
  • F12 Go To Definition from within Provisional Tab navigates to top of file instead of specific location. #77382
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35903.09 #77403

PullRequests

Created

  • Extensions: resolve like classic extension methods #77423
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Merge feature 'partial events and constructors' to main #77410
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77409
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Configure main-vs-deps #77408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix issue where we were changing semantics when converting to a collection expr. #77417
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Offer 'with' keyword for constructor arguments in a collection expression #77420
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: rewrite delegate and function pointer creations #77378
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Update formatting to support key-value-pair elements in a collection expr. #77419
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update formatting tests #77418
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge main into features/dictionary-expressions #77415
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Detect and emit more idiomatic null check patterns #77412
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Improve performance of SyntaxReplacer.ReplaceNode #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Partial events and constructors: IDE #77337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Fix issue where goto-def wouldn't go to the right place after invokining twice in a MAS file. #77405
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expression arguments: ref safety tests #77381
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions

Updated

  • Allow user to control if they want generated-doc results to appear in navigate to. #74765
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bump BCL references to 9.0 #76890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete `Dictionary<TKey, TValue>` target type #76502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77400
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implemented IVsEditorFactoryChooser on AbstractEditorFactory class to invoke WinForms designer editor factory directly by VS Shell #77306
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expression arguments: evaluate arguments before elements when calling `[CollectionBuilder]` factory method #77344
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Implement field null resilience analysis #77127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: First attempt at cleaning up package load to do less thread switching during InitializeAsync #77368
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Recommend updating to msquic 2.4.8 #113136
  • [API Proposal]: Provide trim-safe overload for `ValidationContext` construction #113134
    10.0.0
  • MemoryMarshal.{Try}Read/{Try}Write/AsRef should allow ref struct #113132
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration add the ability to bypass "FormatException: A duplicate key" #113123
    Future
  • how to keep assemblyloadcontext alive after call Unload #113122
  • Directory.GetFiles() returns file paths with trailing spaces if the directory path has trailing spaces #113120
  • [API Proposal]: Flexible OpenSSL provider support #113118
  • Test failure: Loader/ExternalAssemblyProbe/ExternalAssemblyProbe/ExternalAssemblyProbe.cmd #113117
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Perf_BinaryIntegerTensorPrimitives Regressions on 2/27/2025 6:42:04 PM +00:00 #113133
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger Regression on 2/26/2025 8:50:59 PM +00:00 #113135
  • ThunkPool doesn't work with PROCESS_MITIGATION_DYNAMIC_CODE_POLICY #113114
    10.0.0
  • Populate OTel Schema URL on HTTP Activity Sources and Meters #113109
  • Benchmark Regressions from Profile Maintenance and Block Layout Changes #113108
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Field access of struct is not hoisted when bounds check is not eliminated #113107
    Future
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_35000/test35000/test35000.cmd #113106
  • Threaded jiterpreter is not available in .NET 9 #113104
    Future
  • Crash at Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceCollectionContainerBuilderExtensions.BuildServiceProvider(IServiceCollection services, ServiceProviderOptions options) #113103

Closed

  • PAL_SEHException thrown from managed code when called from native code #112497
  • Signal SIGILL (Illegal instruction) code ILL_ILLOPN (Illegal operand) after migrate to .net9 #112897
  • Investigate potential ARM64 perf improvements in AsciiUtility and Utf16Utility #40805
  • Mac OSX - Timer runs early and causes Elapsed Handler to execute twice. #113089
  • Implementation of AppContext.BaseDirectory and DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory handling on NativeAOT in the SharedLibrary scenario is unintuitive #112290
  • NativeAOT Libraries support for `DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory` is undefined #90131
    Future
  • error CS1056: Unexpected character '−' with Regex on Mac #113077
  • Add schema URL support #63651
    10.0.0
  • Is it allowed to use .NET preview versions for commercial purposes? #113119
  • For loop condition section throw stack overflow exception in x86 release sdk .net 8 #113116
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.AcceptConnectionAsync_ThrowingCallbackOde_KeepRunning #113105
  • LoaderAllocator selection logic for a generic type instance does not account for a LoaderAllocator of type itself #111611
  • InvariantGlobalization does not behave as documented #113097

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand `Span<T>` capture #113141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Speculative assertions for issue 109410 #113140
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix issues in GetKeyedService() and GetKeyedServices() with AnyKey #113137
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • [Wasm] Improve error logging for ES6 module assertion #113131
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix trivial typo #113130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump rollup from 4.18.0 to 4.34.9 in /src/mono/browser/runtime #113129
    area-DependencyModel, javascript
  • Fix test failure from #113051 #113128
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Replace load local address with load global #113125
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Link peer's X509 stack handle to parent SSL safe handle #113124
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix Sve test templates to avoid buffer overrun #113113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Mark unreachable handler regions as cold when using PGO data #113110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Switch Ubuntu 24.04 testing to use Ubuntu 22.04 temporarily #113138
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix exception propagation from managed to native on Unix #112957
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Remove unused file Interop.PFXExportCertStore.cs #112801
    area-System.Security
  • Disable ARM NEON path in dn_simdhash due to performance issues #113092
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Harden some reflection invoke tests #113000
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement
  • Move UMEntryThunk to StubPrecode infrastructure #112460
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Set AppContext.BaseDirectory and the lookup path for AssemblyDirectory to the directory containing the NativeAOT module #112457
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Backport "Ship CoreCLR packages in servicing releases" #113026
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.4
  • Use invariant culture when formatting capture transfer in regex source generator #113081
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Support Telemetry Schema Url in tracing and metrics #113034
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 10.0.0
  • JIT: stop using ehTrueEnclosingTryIndexIL outside of importation #113102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Generate boot config as javascript module #112947
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use `WriteDoubleLittleEndian` in `NumericGraphemeInfo` #112611
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, reduce-unsafe
  • JIT: Mark certain intrinsics as non-escaping #113093
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix icon and vn mismatch in an assertion #113072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow `MakeGenericType`/`MakeArrayType` of arbitrary types #112986
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [infra] Add runtime-llvm to build analysis #113086
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] build paltests #112404
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Document exceptions in OrderedDictionary #113091

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-04
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Start running the wasi library tests #3027

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The PackAddsCorrectFilesForProjectsWithOutputNameSpecified test fails due to assembly name not being overridden #47246

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] SDK version not displayed in .NET 10 Preview 2 installer UI #47080
  • An issue was encountered verifying workloads. For more information, run "dotnet workload update". #46187
  • Dotnet SDK 8 breaks deterministic builds #37371
  • .NET 8 SDK stopped building projects in Linux: `You must install or update .NET to run this application` #38794
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET10 preview 1 SDK installed, Error "Version 35.99.0-preview.1.136 of package microsoft.android.sdk.windows.msi.x64 is not found in NuGet feeds...“ displays if running "dotnet workload install android --skip-manifest-update" #47250
  • Allow NuGet.CommandLine to be installed/used with dotnet tool #47256
  • dotnet CLI should support search of NuGet packages on one or all configured sources #12891
  • [WebToolsE2E]After installing SDK 10.0 Preview 1, wasm-tools can be displayed on dotnet workload list but it doesn't work #46684
  • dotnet tool install is failing: One of the request inputs is out of range. #47223

PullRequests

Created

  • Validate while publishing from the VMR #47264
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove "aspnetcoremodule_$(Architecture)_en_v2_..." bundled installer… #47262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47258
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Move branding information to targets file #47260
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Skip attribute from tests related to issue #47246 #47247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create copilot-instructions.md #47204
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Suppress welcome message with get* builds Fixes #38444 #47197
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sync NativeAOTRuntimePack with ILCompilerSupported RIDs #47229
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix signing opt in/out #47232
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47249
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Use pipeline artifacts for final artifacts" #47233
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Go back further to buildartifacts #47267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workloads build #47225
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    Area-run-file
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, Area-run-file
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2655355 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #46989
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.4
  • Draft of guidelines for managing various kinds of breaking changes in the SDK #45288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure container generation uniformly reports outputs to MSBuild #47234
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Disable BundleNativeAotCompiler for riscv64 architecture #42158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Attempt to Fix and Re-enable HasIncludedFiles Test #47220
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
